articles.title: Bruins strike early, hold off Golden Knights 4-3 for 9th win in 11 games
articles.description:
Charlie McAvoy started a three-goal flurry in a 54-second span in the first period, David Pastrnak had a goal and two assists and the Boston Bruins held off the Vegas Golden Knights 4-3 on Thursday night
